𓊡 𓏲 #ṯꜣw typhoon 大风 太风 tàifēng psm? 𓊡 𓏲 #ṯꜣw typhoon तूफ़ान ṭūfān "violent storm" طوفان tūfān (توفان/طوفان) meaning "storm" 𓊡 𓏲 #ṯꜣw typhoon tūfīdan توفیدن/طوفیدن "to roar, to blow furiously" <?> طوفان ṭūfān Arabic ṭāfa, to turn round 𓊡 𓏲 #ṯꜣw typhoon <> Greek monster Τυφῶν Typhon Typhôn ≈ 𓇓 𓅱 𓏏 𓏮 𓁣 Seth Typhos Τυφώς, Typhṓs Τυφωεύς Typhōeús 𓊡 𓏲 #ṯꜣw <> tornado √turn

𓊡 туг TUCH

Classical Mongolian ᠲᠤᠭ (tug), Old Chinese 纛 (OC *duːɡs, *duːɡ, “yak-tail banner”). Turkish tuğ.
туг • (tug) IPA(key): /tʰʊk/
flag
bunch, tuft
yak-tail banner
